title: Qute: InteliJ breaks qute templates syntax
body:
### Describe the bug

This tag works in Qute

```{#validation field='username'}{/validation}```

After reformat with InteliJ it looks like this:

```{#validation field = 'username'}{/validation}```

Now Qute gives me two errors: 

```
#1 Incorrect expression found: {field}
#2 Incorrect expression found: {=}
```

### Expected behavior

_No response_

_No response_
